original_title: Five Little Peppers And How They Grew
overview: The first of four films in the "Five Little Peppers" series, based on Margaret Sinclair's popular book, about a widowed mother and her five children. In this one the family inherits co-ownership in a copper mine.
tagline: YOU ASKED TO MEET ALL OF THEM AGAIN...So here they are
title: Five Little Peppers And How They Grew
